segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye with its everyday feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in drying dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing a dress and apron, looking all domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her side, stacks of clean dishes wait on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other wall, cabinets are open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing the stool to grab some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks thrilled, balancing with one hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting backâ€” that's dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl next to him is reaching up eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's probably his partner in crime for this snack raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The view out the window to the garden is so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR
